resources.string: If you need help, press the question mark at the top right

Click on the different rounds to change color 
You can repeat your drawing as many times as you want by pressing the broom 
If you want to erase a part of your drawing, use the eraser. 

Each time you press the magnifying glass with the +, the line of your drawing becomes bigger 
Each time you press the magnifying glass with the -, the line of your drawing becomes thinner
Reduces the thickness of the line
Increases the thickness of the line
